assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: D B Realty Limited operates as a real estate development company in India. It develops residential projects, including condominiums and duplexes; and commercial, retail, and other projects, such as mass housing and cluster redevelopment. The company was incorporated in 2007 and is based in Mumbai, India.
